textAfterTable: 20 Songs Biography Born: 12 November 1906 in Houston, MS Genre: Blues Years Active: '30s, '40s, '50s, '60s, '70s Bukka White (true name: Booker T. Washington White) was born in Houston, Mississippi (not Houston, Texas) in 1906 (not any date between 1902-1905 or 1907-1909, as is variously reported). He got his initial start in music learning fiddle tunes from his father. Guitar instruction soon followed, but White's grandmother objected to anyone playing "that Devil music" in the household; nonetheless, his father eventually bought him a guitar.
